pull.title: [P2P] When clearing addrman clear mapInfo and mapAddr.
pull.body: Power failure on my machine resulted in a corrupted addrman that would hit bad assertions when trying to serialize the "cleared" addrman to disk: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/6866b4912b8013ed748d12250209f7079a3c92e6/src/addrman.h#L320

events.message: when clearing addrman clear mapInfo and mapAddr
